name: housekeeping

housekeeping noun [U]
(CLEANING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the management of a home and the work that needs to be done in it, such as cleaning : She had a relaxed attitude to housekeeping.
the department of a hotel that is responsible for cleaning guest's bedrooms: the Ritz-Carlton's head of housekeeping

housekeeping noun [U]
(MONEY)
(also housekeeping money) the money used for buying food and other things necessary for living in a house: My grandfather used to give my grandmother housekeeping each week.
